articles.author: Jeff Wicks
articles.title: Anglo 'expended huge resources' to influence ANC, transition, former exec says - News24
articles.description: Anglo American bosses spent vast resources to influence returning ANC leaders, and alongside covert intelligence gathering networks, shaped financial policy in the years of transition from apartheid state to democracy.

articles.title: Waterford's Seamus Power wins second title on PGA Tour with victory in Bermuda - The42
articles.description: The Butterfield Bermuda Championship saw Power battle it out with American Ben Griffin.
articles.content:
WATERFORDS SEAMUS POWER is celebrating a second PGA Tour title win after victory at the Butterfield Bermuda Championship.
